# init(content:)

**Initializer**

Creates a hosting configuration with the given contents.

## Declaration

```swift
init(@ViewBuilder content: () -> Content)
```

## Parameters

- **content**: The contents of the SwiftUI hierarchy to be shown inside the cell.
title: init(content:)
